div.p: THANK YOU ALL. THE FACTOR OF THE DAY WE TRY TO
HELP WOUNDED SERVICEMEN AS MUCH AS WE CAN.
THESE FOLKS HAVE SACRIFICED TREMENDOUSLY FOR US.
WHEN THEY COME BACK TO THE UUSA FROM THE BATTLEFIELD WE OWE
THEM. IT'S A WOUNDED WARRIOR POSTED
SIGNED BY THE SIX LIVING FIRST LADIES OF THE UNITED STATES.
THERE'S NO OTHER ITEM LIKE THIS IN THE ENTIRE WORLD.
THUS, IT IS HISTORICALLY SIGNIFICANT, VERY VALUABLE.
ESPECIALLY BECAUSE NANCY REAGAN HAS SIGNED THE POSTER.
MRS. REAGAN, NOW 91 YEARS OLD AND IS IT NOT SIGN ANYTHING, BUT
SHE CONSENTED TO DO THIS TO HELP THE GRIEFIOUSLY WOUNDED.
GO TO BILLOREILLY.COM AND YOU CAN BID ON THE POSTER.
I'M OPENING THE AUCTION TONIGHT AT $5,000.
IF YOU CAN'T AFFORD THAT, WE UNDERSTAND.
HOW ABOUT A $25 DONATION TO THE WOUNDED WARRIORS?
THAT WILL GET YOU A REPLICA OF THE POSTER SUITABLE FOR FRAMING.
HOPE YOU CHECK IT OUT. THERE'S NO BETTER CAUSE.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. AND THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT.
PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR WEBSITE WHICH IS
DIFFERENT FROM BILLOREILLY.COM. ALSO, WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO SPOUT
